attributes.action: More research into exhaust/inlet venting technologies to strengthen our national defence.
attributes.additional_details:
With the impending threat of the US military's 'Death Star' program.
(See: https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/secure-resources-and-funding-and-begin-construction-death-star-2016/wlfKzFkN)

The national security of the United Kingdom could be put at risk by our lack of R&D in the 'Subspace superweapon' area.

I'm suggesting, by simply re-diverting a reletively small amount of funding into the research and development of exhaust and inlet venting technologies, the country can create a "Death Star deterrent" in a thorough, but cost effective manner.
